name: Portfolio
description: More than just a portfolio, this site is a playground for my technical and creative experiments!

pageContent.description: More than just a portfolio, this site is a playground for my technical and creative experiments. Built from scratch with React, it serves as a live demonstration of my ability to bridge the gap between design and engineering. From custom hooks to optimized asset loading, every line of code is written to ensure that the technology stays invisible, leaving only a smooth, engaging journey for the visitor.
myWork: Crafted intuitive user interfaces and conducted UX research to ensurie a seamless and accessible digital experience
Developed the web application using React, leveraging modern JavaScript to implement high-performance and scalable components

pageContent.description:
Speed ahead on your rollerblades and rollback while keeping your momentum to access shortcuts. Dive into a simulation with a 2000s aesthetic and lose yourself in the rhythm of Drum & Bass.

As a glory-hungry hacker, find the system’s weak spot!
myWork: Conceptualized and built interactive, user-centric interfaces from wireframes to final integration
Developed scalable mechanics and core systems to deliver a stable, engaging player experience
Produced exhaustive Technical Design Documents (TDD) to document architecture and mitigate technical risks

name: Python Tools
description: Tools and software developed in Python during my apprenticeship at Bizaroïd.

pageContent.description:
Tools and software developed in Python during my apprenticeship at Bizaroïd to optimise the production pipeline in the field of film post-production.

This resulted in the creation of internal software communicating with Google APIs, as well as extensions for Davinci Resolve software to provide a bridge to FTrack.
myWork: Conceptualised and developed internal software to export film thumbnails to Google Sheets
Developed extensions for Davinci Resolve to create gateways with FTrack software

name: Transatlantic
description: Come aboard the Transatlantic and dismantle a contraband ring!

pageContent.description: Come aboard the Transatlantic and dismantle a contraband ring in this captivating game developed with Unreal Engine in C++. As the UX Designer, I meticulously crafted the experience to ensure coherent and intuitive level progression, empowering players to strategically uncover and dismantle the network with deep immersion.
myWork: Engineered player mechanics and developed intelligent NPC behaviors in C++
Designed a cohesive level layout with a strong focus on user experience, ensuring intuitive navigation for the player
Conducted extensive research into 1920s naval architecture to ensure historical accuracy and deliver an immersive atmosphere

name: C# Tools
description: Unity tools developed in C# during my internship at Dada! Animation.

pageContent.description:
Custom Unity tools developed in C# during my internship at Dada! Animation to streamline the production pipeline for cartoons and documentaries.

This resulted in the creation of internal extensions for rapid project setup and specialized artist assistance tools. A key contribution was the development of a custom Render Queue, automating and accelerating the rendering process to significantly optimize final export workflows.
myWork: Engineered custom tools to automate project initialization, ensuring immediate environment readiness and workflow standardization
Developed specialized Unity extensions to streamline 3D environment creation and assist artists with asset integration
Implemented a custom render queue system to automate and accelerate final exports, significantly reducing manual overhead
Authored comprehensive documentation for every tool to ensure seamless onboarding and long-term maintainability for the artists

name: Hot On The Trail
description: Step into the shoes of Inspector Morbier and hunt down New York City's most elusive criminal!

pageContent.description:
Step into the shoes of Inspector Morbier in this high-energy 2D Unity platformer, as you hunt down New York City's most elusive criminal.

Navigate the urban skyline by mastering dynamic traversal mechanics, from high-speed ziplines to powerful stomp attacks, while tackling an array of challenging platforming sequences designed to test your precision and timing.
myWork: Engineered core player mechanics and world interaction systems, focusing on responsive controls to enhance player immersion
Designed and blocked out level layouts, focusing on player flow and pacing to ensure an intuitive and engaging experience
